title: Find Your Balance at Avana Stoneridge!
posting_body: ['Relax and Rejuvenate in Your New Home', 'Find Your Perfect Balance', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 55', 'OR Text', '55', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact us.', 'Avana Stoneridge', '5505 Springhouse Drive, Pleasanton, CA, 94588', 'Interested in more information?', 'See link below:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 650 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Imagine your oasis; a vision of comfort, convenience and peace of mind.', 'At Avana Stoneridge, we understand the importance of finding balance.', "That's why we have designed a home specifically with you in mind, to support all of your needs in life, work and play.", 'Situated in the heart of Hacienda Business Park, home to over 500 diverse employers and arguably ranked among the best Schools in California, Avana Stoneridge is just steps away from boundless opportunities.', "If you're up for some fun on your day off, the area boasts 12 acres of beautiful parks just waiting to be explored, along with a wide variety of recreational activities.", 'Not to mention the Main Street charm, shopping and fine dining options that await you just moments away in Downtown Pleasanton.', "No matter what it is you're looking for, you're never far from it.", 'Find your perfect balance at Avana Stoneridge.', 'Features', '- Bar Top Countertops', '- Central air', '- High speed internet and cable ready', '- Convenience of in-home washers and dryers*', '- Stainless steel appliances', '- Serene private balconies and patios', '- Walk-in closets', '- Extra storage space*', '- Spacious, modern kitchens', '- Cozy fireplace*', 'Community Amenities', '- Reserved covered Parking', '- State-of-the-art Fitness Center', '- 2 BBQ grill', '- Heated Swimming pool', '- Outdoor Patio', '- Guest parking', '- Emergency Maintenance', '- Professional Landscaping', '- Package Acceptance Service', '- Resident Community Room With Wi-Fi Access', '- Hacienda Business Park (24-hour courtesy patrol, parks, recreation and free commuter options)', '- Well-equipped Playground', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Friendly', 'Office Hours', 'Mon-Fri 9:00am-6:00pm', 'Sat 10:00am-5:00pm', 'Sun 12:00pm-5:00pm', '8pd4aFaG4']
